briefdescription.para: External input with frequency below this threshold (expressed in kHz) will be ignored.
Parameter setting the precision for the precision in the bisection procedure followed by Network::find_sol_bisection (used in case of oscillatory external poissonian input)
Parameter setting the number of warmup epochs which are neglected if optimizer is set to ADAM or SGD_MEAN.
Function computing the CDF of the poissonian distribution (with some approximations)

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< unsigned > &v_out, vector< double > &v_t, unsigned lenght, double step_res, double half_w, double dur, double tt0)
memberdef.name: count_spikes

briefdescription.para: Function counting the spike number of spikes of v_t in time windows of half-width half_w with "stride" equal tostep_res.
